name: Emoji Puzzle - Fun Emoji Game
description:
Super fun emoji and exciting puzzle game is waiting for you. All you need is rich imagination to match emojis in Emoji Puzzle.
Let’s find related emoji and connect them. After finishing you will win game.
That's all? It's not as easy emoji puzzle as you think!

Features:
Each level emoji is well-designed
Fun and unique pairs of emotion are used
More than 100 different puzzles gameplay
Variety emojis from easy to difficult
Very simple to play by just using your fingers to swipe and match

All the fun emojis will be matched logically that helps you to train your imagination. Download Emoji Puzzle game now so you can become an emoji expert!
